entries.title: Wendy’s CIO Kevin Vasconi Rethinks Customer Experience For The Digital Age
entries.description: Kevin Vasconi has been a digital trailblazer, especially in the restaurant industry. For the past two plus years, he has translated all he has learned as the CIO at Wendy's. His vision for the future forms a models others should emulate.
